column4: Can anyone tell me what is the path to edit hard drive entries something like fstat or something
Hard drive entries???
Do you mean /etc/fstab?
yes, thank you
how can I apply permissions of 777 to a removeable drive such as a WD My Book?
I tried doing chmod 777 /media/My Book, but that did not work
Not directly I don't think.
Ok so can I upgrade 7.10 to 8.04 or 8.10?
That you can definitely do.
ok so I can do 7.10 to 8.10
no.  You have to go one at a time.  7.10 to 8.04 to 8.10 to 9.04
The only except is LTS to LTS (8.04 to whatever the next one will be)
Do you have data that you don't want to lose on the ubuntu install?  It is probably easier to just get a 9.04 disk and reinstall the O.S. if not.
right I was thinking of that but not an option right now
I have some data but I can always backup MYSQL and tranfer that to my PC here

You could (if you have room) make a new partition that will become your /home.  Copy all of you /home onto the new partition and install 9.04 over the old partition mounting the new /home.  Does that make sense?
It is risky doing it remotely :)
yeah you have a point
k I wont go there, I guess it will have to wait.
thanks
NP!
